name: Rodoo
short_description: I coded Rodoo for personal use initially, then cleaned it up, named it, and I've put it up here for everybody. I find that it is most useful when set to run in your ~/.bash_profile (a task the installer handles). I plan to make a Windows version, as well, don't hold your breath.
summary: Command line todo list app with urgency-based highlighting
